com.gemalto.idp.mobile.fasttrack.protector

Interface TokenDevice

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CapTokenDevice, OathTokenDevice

    public interface TokenDevice
    The interface TokenDevice. TokenDevice is used to compute OTP.
    Since:
    5.3.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods

      void changePin(String oldPin, String newPin)
      Change PIN uses the following rules: A PIN rule that prevents using identical PINs. A PIN rule that prevents a PIN from being uniform, for example: 11111. A PIN rule that prevents a PIN from being a palindrome, for example: 12321. A PIN rule that prevents a PIN from being a series, for example: 1234, 4321. A PIN rule that specifies a minimum length of 4 and a maximum length of 8

    • Method Detail

      • changePin

        void changePin(@NonNull
               String oldPin,
               @NonNull
               String newPin)
        throws FastTrackException
        Change PIN uses the following rules:
        • A PIN rule that prevents using identical PINs.
        • A PIN rule that prevents a PIN from being uniform, for example: 11111.
        • A PIN rule that prevents a PIN from being a palindrome, for example: 12321.
        • A PIN rule that prevents a PIN from being a series, for example: 1234, 4321.
        • A PIN rule that specifies a minimum length of 4 and a maximum length of 8
        Parameters:
        oldPin - The old pin
        newPin - The new pin
        Throws:
        FastTrackException - The exception (if any)

      • isBioFingerprintModeActivated

        @Deprecated
boolean isBioFingerprintModeActivated()
        Deprecated. 
        Checks if BioFingerprint mode is activated.
        Returns:
        The boolean

      • activateBioFingerprintMode

        @Deprecated
void activateBioFingerprintMode(@NonNull
                                            String pin)
                                     throws FastTrackException
        Deprecated. 
        Activates the BioFingerprint mode.

        Warning: The SDK will not be able to detect if PIN value is correct or not. Giving invalid PIN causes the tokenDevice to end up in a unrecoverable state. Integrator may need to validate the PIN value through OTP verification on the server before performing this operation.

        Parameters:
        pin - The pin text
        Throws:
        FastTrackException - The exception. Check for FastTrackException constant error codes for more information. Possible error codes are:
        • FastTrackException.BIO_FINGERPRINT_NOT_SUPPORTED
        • FastTrackException.BIO_FINGERPRINT_NOT_CONFIGURED
        • FastTrackException.INTERNAL_ERROR

      • deActivateBioFingerprintMode

        @Deprecated
void deActivateBioFingerprintMode()
                                       throws FastTrackException
        Deprecated. 
        Deactivates the BioFingerprint mode.
        Throws:
        FastTrackException - The exception. Check for FastTrackException constant error codes for more information. Possible error codes are:
        • FastTrackException.INTERNAL_ERROR

      • authenticateWithBioFingerprint

        @Deprecated
void authenticateWithBioFingerprint(@NonNull
                                                android.os.CancellationSignal signal,
                                                @NonNull
                                                BioFingerprintAuthenticationCallbacks callbacks)
        Deprecated. 
        Authenticates with a fingerprint and this is an asynchronous call. Update is provided in the callbacks.
        Parameters:
        signal - The signal is used for cancel the authentication process. Please manage the object carefully as the same object passed in this call are required to fire the cancellation call.
        callbacks - The callbacks which updates application integrator on the authentication progress. Callbacks are fired on the Main thread.

      • isBiometricModeActivated

        boolean isBiometricModeActivated()
        Checks if Biometric mode is activated.
        Returns:
        The boolean
        Since:
        5.4.0

      • activateBiometricMode

        void activateBiometricMode(@NonNull
                           String pin)
                    throws FastTrackException
        Activates the Biometric mode.

        Warning: The SDK will not be able to detect if PIN value is correct or not. Giving invalid PIN causes the tokenDevice to end up in a unrecoverable state. Integrator may need to validate the PIN value through OTP verification on the server before performing this operation.

        Parameters:
        pin - The pin text
        Throws:
        FastTrackException - The exception. Check for FastTrackException constant error codes for more information. Possible error codes are:
        • FastTrackException.BIOMETRIC_NO_HARDWARE
        • FastTrackException.BIOMETRIC_HW_UNAVAILABLE
        • FastTrackException.BIOMETRIC_NOT_ENROLLED
        • FastTrackException.INTERNAL_ERROR
        Since:
        5.4.0

      • deActivateBiometricMode

        void deActivateBiometricMode()
                      throws FastTrackException
        Deactivates the Biometric mode.
        Throws:
        FastTrackException - The exception. Check for FastTrackException constant error codes for more information. Possible error codes are:
        • FastTrackException.INTERNAL_ERROR
        Since:
        5.4.0

      • authenticateWithBiometric

        void authenticateWithBiometric(@NonNull
                               String title,
                               @Nullable
                               String subTitle,
                               @Nullable
                               String description,
                               @NonNull
                               String negativeButtonText,
                               @NonNull
                               android.os.CancellationSignal signal,
                               @NonNull
                               BiometricAuthenticationCallbacks callbacks)
        Authenticates with a biometric and this is an asynchronous call. The update is provided in the callbacks. This is available on Android 28 and later.
        Parameters:
        title - the title to display.
        subTitle - Optional: the subtitle to display.
        description - Optional: the description to display.
        negativeButtonText - the text to be shown on the negative button.
        signal - The signal is used for cancel the authentication process. Please manage the object carefully as the same object passed in this call are required to fire the cancellation call.
        callbacks - The callbacks which updates application integrator on the authentication progress. Callbacks are fired on the Main thread.
        Since:
        5.4.0

      • getType

        MobileProtector.OtpType getType()
        Gets the tokenDevice type
        Returns:
        tokenDevice type
